summary:
Play a land animation when the player fall from a high place.
A little more immersion for your game never hurts, I guess :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]

[i][size=4]Check out my new quest mod:[/size][color=#d8d8d8] [/color][/i][color=#ff0000][size=5]『[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9554?][color=#00ffff][size=5]The Final Cataclysm[/size][/color][/url][color=#ff0000][size=5]』
[/size][/color][url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/5565647-skyrim-mods-final-cataclysm/]
[/url][/size]

[youtube]yKi6c_QvS0E[/youtube]

[size=4]Skyrim Special Edition version:[/size][color=#fff2cc] [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8787?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8787?[/url]


[color=#fff2cc]-If you have a "silent roll" perk, you can roll by moving forward while landing. This way you only take 1/2 fall damage.[/color]


[b]Installing the mod just like every other mod. No requirement or anything.[/b]


[b]Uninstalling.[/b]
[size=3]-type in console "help" and find a spell called "Fall Animation". (xx000D64)[/size]
[size=3]-Remove the spell via the console.[/size]
[size=3]-uninstall the mod.[/size]
[/center]
author: LertKrush
